A Study of the Characteristics, Cost and Magnitude of Interlibrary Loans in Academic Libraries .A Palmour, V.E. The investigation of interlibrary loans among academic libraries was initiated by the Interlibrary Loan Study Committee of the Association of Research Libraries.  It was seen as a fundamental first step toward the solution of current problems and the exploration of the means to improve interlibrary loan services nationally.  This report provides solid information that is basic to any future planning at the national level. .X 5	1	1390 10	6	1390 33	1	1390 36	1	1390 41	1	1390 89	1	1390 90	2	1390 91	1	1390 97	1	1390
